abstract: Coca-Cola‘s board was a thirsty bunch last year: The company’s latest proxy shows it provided $12,500 in free products to directors, up nearly 80 percent from 2007.
snippet: Coca-Cola‘s board was a thirsty bunch last year: The company’s latest proxy shows it provided $12,500 in free products to directors, up nearly 80 percent from 2007.
lead_paragraph: Like many companies, Coca-Cola has long provided its directors with free products.

headline.main: A Drinking Binge on Coke’s Board
